data.description:
BricksVR is a multiplayer sandbox building game in VR in early access.

- Invite friends to a shared world and build creations together. Shared worlds include voice chat, physics, and the ability to save progress.
- You're not limited by what's in the box in BricksVR. Place thousands of bricks on mobile VR with no lag, and choose from over 16 million brick colors.
- Wander around your builds from the perspective of a miniature person, or stomp around and chase others as a giant!
- Open your world to the public to show off your creations. You can also lock your world so visitors can't make changes.

Changelog:
- Adds the ability to export your world to 3D models. The functionality is found in the room menu.
- Adds small imperfections to the brick models
- Change brick rendering to be more shiny and specular
- Fix bug where usernames above heads weren't rendering in multiplayer
- Fix bug where the slider on the brick menu would flicker in the tutorial

- Fixes bad mesh on 2x2 corner brick
- Fixes bad mesh on 1x4x2/3 slope
- Fixes bug where you could grab parts of the brick menu when it was closed
- Fixes bug where the brick menu category slider could become displaced by grabbing it and then closing the menu
- Fixes bug where 2x2 corner brick could not be placed sometimes

- Completely revamp the brick menu:
  - Color sliders are now collapsible 
  - Adds 2 more saved color spots
  - Brick menu is now smaller
  - Allow changing between brick categories using a grab slider
  - Improve aesthetics of brick tiles
- Adds 2x2 L-shaped brick, plate, and tile
- Adds 1x1 round tile
- Adds 2x2 plate with 1 stud
- Adds 2x1 plate with 1 stud
- Adds 1x4x2/3 slope
- Adds new 15% option when adjusting player scale
- Adjust ambient and directional lighting to improve overall visual quality
- Fix bug where other players could change the color in your color palette
- Fix bug where multiple bricks in the brick menu could be hovered at once
- Fix bug where brick menu would lag 1 frame behind the hand
- Fix bug where color slider grab knob had a collider that affected bricks
- Fix aspect ratio on avatar mouths and eyes
- Fix underside connectors on the 2x8 plate
- Fix lag spike when loading recent rooms list
- Fix bug where 1x6 arch wouldn't spawn in your hand when using the hand spawner
- Other assorted bug fixes and performance improvements

- Add eyes and mouths to the avatar editor
  - Choose from 12 different eyes and 12 different mouths
- Add 1x1 pyramid brick
- Add 1x1 30 degree cheese slope
- Add 1x4 masonry brick
- Add 1x4 arch
- Improve anti-aliasing and flickering on both Quest and PCVR versions
- Fix bug where you could get stuck in the tutorial
- Other minor bug fixes.

- Added player avatar editor.
  - Choose from 18 different primary and secondary colors
  - You can change your player color in the main menu or in the in-game menu.
- Add 1x3 and 1x6 arch brick
- Add inverted 1x2 slope brick
- Add rotation speed setting. This affects both snap turn and smooth turn.
- Fix broken shadows on masonry bricks
- Add transparency to the brick menu
- Add 'Find friends' info page
- Change player name font to be more legible on different backgrounds
- Fix bug where losing internet connection would give you an unsupported version error
- Fix bug where bricks attached to player heads randomly disappeared or become un-attachable when using a non-unlimited render distance.
- Fix bug where bricks would sometimes duplicate when you grabbed them.
- Fix frame drop issue when switching between lasers

- Adds new player hands and a player face
- Adds new masonry brick under Misc bricks
- Fixes collider on 2x6 tile
- Improves some copy in the tutorial
- Increases brick download timeout for large worlds

- Aligns build tables so you can build bridges between them
- Change room codes to 8 digits long
- Update plant brick mesh to newer version provided by David184
- Temporarily remove vignette setting
- Enable MSAA
- Disable Z rotation on brick menu
- Add a screen after creating a room telling you the room code and how to invite friends
